name: Ransomware Attack Response Playbook
description: This playbook outlines the steps to respond to a ransomware attack where sensitive data has been encrypted.

action--d29cfa09-c3f8-4c5c-9cf6-d12f389b.name: Isolate infected systems from the network
action--d29cfa09-c3f8-4c5c-9cf6-d12f389b.description: Prevent further spread of ransomware by isolating the infected systems.

commands.command: ip link set dev eth0 down

action--f4b2c20a-5e9a-44b9-bf4e-69d9ca62.name: Kill malicious encryption process
action--f4b2c20a-5e9a-44b9-bf4e-69d9ca62.description: Terminate the encryption process to halt further damage.

action--a1bcde3f-5cbf-4e45-80bc-6fd2cfd2.name: Restore data from backups
action--a1bcde3f-5cbf-4e45-80bc-6fd2cfd2.description: Restore sensitive data from backups if available.

parallel--57d5b8cb-63e0-4c5b-b252-11b3bd.name: Parallel Actions for Ransomware Response
parallel--57d5b8cb-63e0-4c5b-b252-11b3bd.description: Execute multiple actions in parallel after isolating systems.
